alert.note: Alert for Dutchess; Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 4:55PM EDT until July 27 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Litchfield County in northern Connecticut... Southeastern Ulster County in east central New York... Dutchess County in east central New York... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 454 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hartland to near Litchfield to New Paltz, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Torrington, Poughkeepsie, New Milford, Beacon, New Paltz, Sherman, Pawling, Hyde Park, Plattekill, Canton, Pleasant Valley, Thomaston, New Hartford, Wappingers Falls, Amenia, Kent, Highland, Fishkill, Millbrook and Litchfield. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
